paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses cardiac amyloidosis with a focus on transthyretin (TTR) amyloidosis, specifically mentioning the familial transthyretin amyloidosis mutation carriers (Leu111Met) but does not provide detailed variant information or penetrance data.

patients.demographics: 5 familial transthyretin amyloidosis mutation carriers (ATTRm) with cardiac involvement

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with cardiac involvement in familial transthyretin amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The paper mentions the mutation in the context of familial cases but does not provide detailed penetrance statistics.
key_quotes: The CA positive group comprised wild-type transthyretin (ATTRwt) patients (n=10), familial transthyretin amyloidosis mutation carriers (ATTRm) of the Danish ATTRm mutation (Leu111Met) and with cardiac involvement (n=5).

extraction_metadata.notes: The paper primarily discusses the clinical implications of TTR mutations without extensive variant data.
